Articles.Content:
Back in 23.5 and in 24.2 I had this telescope which I think was named "Skylab" or something like that.

I know it came from a mod which I can no longer find.

I am pretty sure this is the one, here is a pic.

Ordan? Maybe that is it... I found it, its in Hullcam VDS. Thank God.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220258-hullcam-vds

I have been searching for it because, it was just cool.

If you got a .25 capable mod in mind to replace this, let me know. I am interested in doing, "Telescope shots" of asteroids to see what kind of shapes they have. If this is at all possible.

Edited December 9, 2014 by ApostleThirteen
pic added

Something like this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60750-WIP-Cacteye-Telescope-v0-1-(2-1-14)-Modular-EVA-serviceable-orbital-telescope

Indeed, only issue is KAS and VDS need fixes. Lol. Thanks robo

Now, to make sure others who read this thread do not get frustrated. The link robopilot99 posted is out of date and deprecated, here is the updated version.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88604-CactEye-Orbital-Telescope

Edited December 9, 2014 by ApostleThirteen
adding updated cacteye
The original one (several versions ago) was named Orbans telescope ... I also had it for a while, really nice to be able to observe one of the other planets from Kerbin orbit

Back in 23.5 and in 24.2 I had this telescope which I think was named "Skylab" or something like that.

I know it came from a mod which I can no longer find.

I am pretty sure this is the one, here is a pic.

Ordan? Maybe that is it... I found it, its in Hullcam VDS. Thank God.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220258-hullcam-vds

http://i.ytimg.com/vi/wRAYHLX-iF4/0.jpg

I have been searching for it because, it was just cool.

If you got a .25 capable mod in mind to replace this, let me know. I am interested in doing, "Telescope shots" of asteroids to see what kind of shapes they have. If this is at all possible.

That part, I'm pretty sure was put in this mod sometime ago and is still in it http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365-0-21-Hullcam-VDS-Mechjeb-hullcam-fork-Updated-15-Sep.
